lang.dontShowMeThisMessageAgain: Don't show me this message again
lang.directions: Click on a red hotspot in the schematic or on an item in the Equipment menu to see corresponding lubricant information. To view more of the schematic, click and drag with your mouse or use the arrow keys on your keyboard.
lang.touchModeQuestion: It appears you’re using a touch-enabled device. Would you prefer to use the touch-optimized interface?

components.name: Compressor, Differentials & Final Drives, Rock Drill Oil

products.name: Mobil Rarus SHC™ 1020 Series
products.information: Supreme performance oils primarily for severe-duty rotary screw and vane air compressors
products.benefits: Wide temperature-range capability; reduces coking deposits; promotes long oil and filter life; lessens sludge formation in crankcases and discharge lines; less potential for emulsion formation

products.name: Mobil Delvac™ Synthetic Gear Oil
products.information: Synthetic gear lubricants for heavy-duty drivetrains requiring relatively high viscosity and excellent load-carrying capability where extreme pressures and shock loading are expected
products.benefits: Extends gear and bearing life due to minimal deposits; retains viscosity and film strength under severe operating conditions to prevent wear; helps minimize leakage and can reduce contamination

products.name: Mobiltrans™ HD Series
products.information: Heavy-duty transmission and drivetrain lubricants for power-shift transmissions, gearboxes and final drives
products.benefits: Optimized clutch friction retention and slippage control help promote long clutch life; outstanding hydraulic-oil stability and protection against high-pressure pump wear; excellent gear protection helps promote long life in transmissions, gearboxes and final drives

products.name: Mobiltrans™ AST
products.information: High-performance lubricant for off-highway transmissions, drive trains and hydraulic systems
products.benefits: Optimum clutch friction retention and slippage control; excellent anti-chatter brake performance; helps promote long clutch/brake life; outstanding protection against deposit formation, which can promote long seal life and long drain and service intervals; exceptional low-temperature fluidity and pumpability for smooth shifting and quick starts

products.name: Mobilube™ HD Plus Gear Oil
products.information: Extra-high-performance gear lubricants for heavy-duty commercial transmissions, axles and final drives
products.benefits: Excellent chemical and thermal stability at elevated bulk-oil temperatures; good performance at low temperatures; good rust protection resulting from water contamination

products.name: Mobil Almo™ 500 Series
products.information: Lubricating oils for rock drills and other percussive- and rotary-type tools
products.benefits: Helps reduce sludge and deposit formation; provides effective lubrication in the presence of water and at high and low temperatures; can reduce component wear and maintenance costs

products.name: Mobil SHC™ 500 Series
products.information: Hydraulic oils for high-pressure vane, piston and gear pumps
products.benefits: Wide temperature-range performance; assures equipment protection at cold startup temperatures; helps protect system components at high operating temperatures; long service intervals; helps promote cleaner system and reduce close-tolerance valve sticking; excellent filterability

products.name: Mobil DTE 10 Excel™ Series
products.information: Hydraulic oils for high-pressure, industrial and mobile equipment hydraulic systems
products.benefits: Helps reduce system deposits leading to reduced machine maintenance and increased component life; helps reduce wear and protects pumps and components for long equipment life; helps prevent aeration and cavitation damage in low-residence time systems

products.name: Mobil DTE™ 20 Series
products.information: Premium-performance hydraulic oils for hydraulic systems using high-pressure, high-output pumps
products.benefits: Helps reduce wear and protects against corrosion; maintains performance features even under severe conditions and extended drain intervals; helps improve system cleanliness; provides long oil, filter and equipment life; helps reduce the negative effects of moisture in systems

products.name: Mobilith SHC™ Series
products.information: High-performance greases for a wide variety of applications at extreme temperatures
products.benefits: Excellent protection against wear, rust and corrosion; provides operating viscosity at high and low temperatures; outstanding thermal stability and oxidation resistance to help extend service and bearing life with long relubrication intervals

products.name: Mobilgrease XHP™ Mine Series
products.information: Lithium complex greases for extra-heavy-duty off-highway and mining equipment
products.benefits: Superb equipment protection and potential equipment life extension even in severe operating conditions; provides excellent low-temperature pumpability and startup performance; long relubrication intervals

products.name: Mobilgrease XHP™ Series
products.information: Lithium complex greases for a wide variety of applications and severe operating conditions
products.benefits: Superb resistance to water washout and spray-off helps assure proper lubrication and protection even in some of the most severe water-exposure conditions; excellent grease tenacity helps reduce leakage and extend relubrication intervals for reduced maintenance requirements; outstanding rust and corrosion resistance

products.name: Mobil Delvac 1™
products.information: Heavy-duty diesel engine oil for modern low-emission diesel engines operating in severe applications as well as older, well-maintained engines
products.benefits: Outstanding thermal and oxidation stability helps reduce low-temperature sludge build-up and high-temperature deposits; enhanced film strength at high temperatures helps reduce engine scuffing and bore polishing; advanced formulations and viscometrics can help improve fuel economy versus 15W-40; low volatility can reduce oil consumption

products.name: Mobil Delvac™ 1300 Super
products.information: Extra-high-performance oils for diesel engines
products.benefits: Excellent corrosion protection and long drain intervals for new and old engines using either low (500ppm) or ultralow (15ppm) sulfur diesel fuel; maintains viscosity in severe, high-temperature service for superb wear protection and long engine life; one engine oil for mixed fleet operations

products.name: Mobil Delvac MX™
products.information: High-performance oil for diesel engines
products.benefits: Helps reduce low-temperature sludge buildup and high-temperature deposits; efficiently handles soot and promotes long drain intervals; eases engine startup and reduces wear; maintains viscosity in severe, high-temperature service

products.name: Mobil Delvac™ Synthetic Gear Oil
products.information: Synthetic gear lubricants for heavy-duty drivetrains requiring relatively high viscosity and excellent load-carrying capability where extreme pressures and shock loading are expected
products.benefits: Extends gear and bearing life due to minimal deposits; retains viscosity and film strength under severe operating conditions to prevent wear; helps minimize leakage and can reduce contamination

products.name: Mobiltrans™ HD Series
products.information: Heavy-duty transmission and drivetrain lubricants for power-shift transmissions, gearboxes and final drives
products.benefits: Optimized clutch friction retention and slippage control help promote long clutch life; outstanding hydraulic-oil stability and protection against high-pressure pump wear; excellent gear protection helps promote long life in transmissions, gearboxes and final drives

products.information: High-performance lubricant for off-highway transmissions, drive trains and hydraulic systems

products.name: Mobilube™ HD Plus Gear Oil
products.information: Extra-high-performance gear lubricants for heavy-duty commercial transmissions, axles and final drives
products.benefits: Excellent chemical and thermal stability at elevated bulk-oil temperatures; good performance at low temperatures; good rust protection resulting from water contamination

products.name: Mobil Delvac™ Synthetic Transmission Fluid
products.information: Synthetic lubricant for manual transmissions in light to severe duty on- and off-highway equipment
products.benefits: Helps extend transmission life and reduce the cost of operation; promotes long seal life and long drain and service intervals; protects against wear; eases starts and shifting; helps promote long life of synchronizers

products.name: Mobil SHC™ Gear OH Series
products.information: Heavy-duty gear oils primarily for enclosed gearing as well as plain and rolling-element bearings in off-highway equipment subject to shock and heavy loading

products.information: Hydraulic oils for high-pressure, industrial and mobile equipment hydraulic systems
